    • Field Detail

      • SALVORS_TALLY_DELAY_SECONDS

        public static float SALVORS_TALLY_DELAY_SECONDS
        How long since discovering or salvaging something before SalvorsTallyIntel pops up. Point is to not pop it up if it's just going to go away real soon anyway.
